description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 19/01228/FUL (Redevelopment of the site to provide 297 residential units in buildings ranging from 4 to 7 storeys, with 207 sq m commercial space (A1, A2, A3, A4, B1 and D1) at ground floor, 123 car parking spaces (including car club and accessible provision); communal landscaped amenity areas, secure cycle parking, stopping up of Avenue Terrace and other associated development) to vary the wording of Condition 43 (Energy and Sustainability Strategy) to allow for Condition to be discharged in 2 parts
decision_conditions: Condition 43 of planning permission 19/01228/FUL which states: No works other than demolition shall be carried out until a detailed Energy and Sustainability strategy has been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details and a revised Carbon Offset calculation and payment provided to the Council for approval.Reason: In the interests of sustainability and energy conservation in accordance with Policies 5.2 (Minimising Carbon Dioxide Emissions) and 5.3 (Sustainable Design & Construction) of the London Plan (March 2016) and Policy DM1 (Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.Is replaced by: 43 (a) No works other than demolition shall be carried out until a detailed Energy and Sustainability strategy, including an updated Carbon Offset calculation, has been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 43 (b) No more than 90% of the development shall be occupied until the Carbon Offset contributions have been paid to the Local Planning Authority. Reason: In the interests of sustainability, energy conservation and minimising greenhouse gas emissions in accordance with Policies SI 2 (Minimising greenhouse gas emissions) & SI 3 (Energy infrastructure) of the London Plan 2021 and and policies CS1, DM3 (Designing for Changing Climate) and DM4 (Water management and Flood Risk) of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
Householder Checklist Update - Once you have provided the above documents please update the Checklist document to confirm that they have been provided.
